title: ITSS Chat Support Portal
body:
ITSS Chat Support Portal
	



		English (US)



IT Support Services is now using BeyondTrust (Bomgar) secure chat for quick answers during normal business hours.By continuing this chat support session you agree to the ITSS Service Agreement.At the end of your chat support session, you will have the opportunity to provide feedback and/or download the chat transcript.We value your time and will assist you as quickly as possible.


ITSS Chat Support is available during our normal business hours.  A chat support technician will be available again on Tuesday at  8:00am PDT.  You can find answers to many questions in the ITSS Knowledge Base or submit a request using the Service Catalog: https://support.csuchico.edu
